tool_description: Resizes images to specified dimensions with various scaling methods and aspect ratio handling options.

input_paths.description: Array of input image file paths

output_directory.description: Directory path where resized images will be saved

target_width.description: Target width in pixels (must be positive)

target_height.description: Target height in pixels (must be positive)

resize_method.description: Resize interpolation method: bilinear, bicubic, nearest, lanczos

maintain_aspect_ratio.description: Whether to maintain original aspect ratio during resize

padding_color.description: RGB values for padding color when maintaining aspect ratio

error_messages: Invalid output directory: The specified output directory does not exist or is not writable.
Invalid dimensions: target_width and target_height must be positive integers.
Unsupported resize method: Use one of [bilinear, bicubic, nearest, lanczos].
Invalid padding color: RGB values must be integers between 0 and 255.
File processing error: Unable to process one or more input images.
Insufficient disk space: Not enough space to save resized images.
usage: Specify input images, output directory, and target dimensions. Choose appropriate resize method and aspect ratio settings based on your model requirements.

resized_paths.description: Array of file paths to successfully resized images

failed_images.description: Array of input paths that failed to resize

resize_summary.description: Summary of resize operation including success count and settings used

output_dimensions.description: Final output dimensions [width, height] used for resizing
